Name: tuna, capture by purse seiner and landing whole, frozen | landed tuna, frozen, EPO | EN15804GD, U
Category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/03:Fishing and aquaculture/031:Fishing/0311:Marine fishing
Description: Current technology deployed in Ecuador includes helicopter spotters used by some of the largest vessels, purse seining based on three types of sets: non-associated with other species (35 %), using fish aggregation devices (FADs, 60 %) and associated with dolphins (5 %); and freezing on-board. Fuel used by spotters is included in the inventory.
